item.title: Julie Andrews - My Favorite Things
item.description:
For educational use. Optimized for GCEA Ukulele.
Chords used: Dm, Bbmaj7, Gm, C7, F, Bb, A7, D, G, G7, Em, Cmaj7, Am, D7, C, B7, E, A, D6
As performed by Julie Andrews in “The Sound of Music”
Tutorial Video (GCEA & DGBE): https://youtu.be/4eFEPAiSnjA
Chord chart ("Tabs") available at: https://ukutabs.com/m/misc-movies/my-favorite-things-two/
************************************************ Video created on the iPad Pro using Luma Fusion. Motion video background from https://www.motionbolt.com
Check out the UkeStuff Podcast, where I talk about ukulele education and my own ukulele experiences. Available on Radio Public, Apple Podcasts, Google Play, Spotify, and Stitcher. item.title: Santa Claus is Coming To Town (Ukulele Play Along) Accompaniment Santa Claus is Coming to Town
item.description: For educational use. This is a ukulele play along for my students for our upcoming concert. Chords: C, C7, F, Fm, Am, G7, Dm, D7, and G.

item.title: Steven Universe - We Are the Crystal Gems
item.description:
For educational use. Optimized for GCEA Ukulele. Keys of F & G.
Chords Used: F, A7, Bb, C, Bbm, Gm7, Am7, Bbm7, E7, Am, Dm, G, Cmaj7, D7, C7, B7, Cm, Em, Gmaj7
As performed on Steven Universe
Tutorial Video (GCEA & DGBE): https://youtu.be/pdzcOAduI8E
******************** Video created on the iPad Pro using Luma Fusion.

item.title: Purple People Eater Lyric Based Play Along With Key Changes
item.description:
For educational use. Created with chord letter names and lyrics so any non-transposing instrumewnt . Keys of D, Eb, E, and F.
Chords Used: D, G, A7, Eb, Ab, Bb7, E, A, B7, F, Bb, C7
As performed by Sheb Wooley.
Tutorial Video (GCEA & DGBE): https://youtu.be/l285RIIffvo

item.title: Joe Brown - Joe Brown - I'll See You In My Dreams - Jools Holland - 2008_UGC
item.description:
**NOT FOR BEGINNERS**
I'll See You In My Dreams by Joe Brown And The Bruvvers. For educational use. Chords Used: A7, Am, Bb, Bb6, Bb6-2, Bbm6, Bbmaj7, C, C7, Cm6, Cmaj7, D, D7, D7-2, D7(HI), D9, Dm, E7, E7-2, Edim, Em7, F, F/C, F6, F6-5, F7, Fmaj7, G7 (yes, this song uses 28 chords). The video is from YouTuber Elisa M. and may be found at https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=VWERLNXIZGc. The chord progressions I used were heavily inspired by Jim’s Ukulele Songbook, which may be found at https://ozbcoz.com/Songs/downloadpdf.php?ID=3748%2Csongbook&fbclid=IwAR2UAs9814iikntmCk_pnDdsa9bE964sFKWluY5DTEEr4dIH5qDr2sdSB50 .
If you found this video useful please subscribe. If you want to be notified of future videos please click on bell next to subscribe.
Do you have a request for a song to be made into a video? First, check the index of play along videos at www.ukeplayalongs.com to make sure your song isn't already available. If it isn't, please fill out this request form: https://forms.gle/84rgm7kFNJWnTqFB6. We cannot promise that a request will be made into a play along, but we do appreciate your recommendations!

item.title: McFly - All About You
item.description:
All About You by McFly. It’s been digitally lowered by 1 semitone so beginner ukulele students can play along. For educational use. Chords Used: C Am F G E7 C7 D7 Fm G+
If you found this video useful please subscribe. If you want to be notified of future videos please click on bell next to subscribe.
Do you have a request for a song to be made into a video? First, check the index of play along videos at www.ukeplayalongs.com to make sure your song isn't already available. item.title: Guava Jam Ukulele Play Along
item.description:
For educational use. Optimized for GCEA ukulele. Key of C.
Chords Used: C, Gsus4, G7, F, D7, Ab, C7
As performed by The Ka'au Crater Boys.
This song has become a part of the traditional ukulele repertoire as a solo (you can find versions on the web if you would like to learn it), but in this case, you will be acting as the "rhythm section" underneath the solo.
I did not create a tutorial for this video, and you can play any strumming pattern that goes along with the rhythm section.
Video created on the iPad Pro using Luma Fusion. The ukulele chord font is available at ukefarm.com.
Do you have a request for a song to be made into a video? First, check the index of play alongs at www.ukeplayalongs.com to make sure your song isn't already available. If it isn't, please fill out this request form: https://forms.gle/84rgm7kFNJWnTqFB6
We cannot promise that a request will be made into a play along, but we do appreciate your recommendations!

item.title: Guava Jam Baritone Ukulele Play Along
item.description:
For educational use. Optimized for DGBE ukulele. Key of C.
Chords Used: C, Gsus4, G7, F, D7, Ab, C7
As performed by The Ka'au Crater Boys.
This song has become a part of the traditional ukulele repertoire as a solo (you can find versions on the web if you would like to learn it), but in this case, you will be acting as the "rhythm section" underneath the solo.
I did not create a tutorial for this video, and you can play any strumming pattern that goes along with the rhythm section.
Video created on the iPad Pro using Luma Fusion. The ukulele chord font is available at ukefarm.com.
